name: unelaborate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not containing a lot of careful detail or many detailed parts: The school was built of brick and glass in the functional and unelaborate manner of the early 1970s. The continental buffet breakfast - hot croissants, fruit, yogurt and cereals - is unelaborate but appealing.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is an unelaborate but perfectly serviceable budget-range hotel with a pool and a coin-operated launderette.The writer for the most part deals with small subjects in an unelaborate manner.Unelaborate burial places have also been found.
